detail_desc: Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Pile lining.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Wide jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative, sewn-on bow at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Lined triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Treggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

Soft, non-wired bra top in microfibre with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and wide, elasticated ribbing at the hem. No fasteners. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Round metal studs. Diameter approx. 3 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves, each with a decorative flap and concealed press-stud. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tops in soft cotton jersey, one patterned. Press-studs at the back of the neck, and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved dress with a gathered seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Top in a patterned viscose weave in a double layer at the top with short flounced sleeves. Open at the front with ties and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, seam under the bust with decorative gathers, and a wide flounce at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with appliqués at the top, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Raw, roll edges at the sleeves and hem.

Fancy dress costume in jersey designed for a small dog. Lined hood with antennae, wings on the back, a hook and loop fastening at the neckline, ribbed sections around the front legs and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside.
Polo-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather sandals with straps with metal buckles at the top and a strap with a hook and loop fastening at the heel. Fabric linings, rubber insoles and textured rubber soles.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Oversized jumper in a soft, marled knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a wide, ribbed hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal rings in various designs, some decorated with sparkly stones.
Shorts in soft, printed jersey with covered elastication and decorative bow at the waist, a small frill trim at the top and side pockets.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with extra-long sleeves.
Boxy T-shirt in soft fabric with gently dropped shoulders.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.

Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide elastic hem.
Fitted, padded jacket in a slightly longer style with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Two-way zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Lined.

Sleeveless maxi dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, covered buttons at the front and smocking at the back. Gathered seam and a tie belt at the waist and gathered seams with a small frill trim on the skirt. Jersey lining.
Trousers in sturdy crêpe jersey with elastication at the back of the waist, pleats at the front, side pockets and tapered legs with side stripes and elasticated hems.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves, a stand-up collar and a frill at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist and zip fly and button.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Jacket in washed denim with worn details and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Cropped top in a soft, fine, rib knit. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets and frayed-edge hems.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Wrapover front with covered buttons at one side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Socks in a fine, pattern-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Yoga socks with elastic straps that cross over the feet and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Ankle-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the top that holds in and shapes the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and legs with sheer sections.
Coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed fastening with two press-studs at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Bomber jacket in shimmering, patterned satin with a zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and welt front pockets. Small, ribbed stand-up collar with a glittery edge, and the same ribbing with a glittery edge at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, frilled collar and decorative drawstring with tassels. Flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, short butterfly sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist.

Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Additional longer layer in jersey at the hem, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton and linen weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons down the front and smocking at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Loafers in imitation suede with rows of fringing on the top. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with fabric flowers.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit with a double-layered wrapover hood and kangaroo pocket.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Block-coloured trousers in sweatshirt fabric with a text print on one leg. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in woven fabric with text embroidery at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish and no buttons.
